question_text: Reflecting on the overall learning environment of this class, in what ways did the instructor(s) and the structure or components of the course facilitate your learning? Are there specific course components or methods of instruction you’d keep for future years?
response_text:
We always watched one episode of a TV series every week, which introduced ourselves to a different way Turkish was spoken outside of the classroom- more slang usage, etc. It really helped me to stay on top of my work. 
Having homework weekly as well as the performance with their reflects made me feel better to learn, because quizzes would've added unnecessary pressure when the whole goal is to learn a new language.
